bug.author: tchaton
bug.summary: For PR #5468, better solution for PredictionCollection `allgather_predictions` in distributed setting.
bug.description:
This function makes several assumptions:
The number of batches seen on all batches is the same. Every element of the dictionary can be converted into a tensor with current implementation of LightningModule.all_gather
Better approach:
Each process saves it own predictions and only rank 0 reload them -> Find a deadlock on loading file from other processes and couldn't find a fix.
